07 September 2016

Early View of Paper in Global Ecology and Biogeography

Steve Vander Wall (University of Nevada, Reno) and I had a paper accepted in Global Ecology and Biogeography, `Interaction diversity of North American seed-dispersal mutualisms'. It is now posted in Global Ecology and Biogeography's Early View webpage: Link to paper.

If you don't have access to the site, you can find a postprint posted on my publications page
